meanings.definition: Having a stronger or more unpleasant odor than something else.
meanings.sent1: The garbage in the bin was much smellier than the fresh flowers.
meanings.sent2: The old socks were smellier than the new ones.
meanings.sent3: The smellier cheese made the mouse wrinkle its nose in disgust.
meanings.sent4: The smellier stench of the skunk filled the entire forest.
meanings.sent5: The smellier the fish, the more the cat turned away in distaste.

meanings.sent1: This cheese is smellier than that one.
meanings.sent2: The gym locker room was smellier after the game.
meanings.sent3: The smellier socks seemed to have a life of their own.
meanings.sent4: The smellier the situation got, the more the kids giggled.
meanings.sent5: The smellier the garbage, the faster the raccoons came to investigate.
